title: Redmi 15C 5G goes official in India with Dimensity 6300 chipset and 6,000 mAh battery
description: The Redmi 15C is now officially launched in India with a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor. The budget-range smartphone is equipped with a 120 Hz LCD panel, a 50 MP primary camera, and a 6,000 mAh battery with 33 W wired charging support.
content: Following its European debut in September 2025, Xiaomi has now officially launched its latest Redmi 15C smartphone in the Indian market. Specs-wise, its no different from its European variant. The de… [+1500 chars]
